objects.description: Execution of [Backdoor.Oldrea](https://collaborate.mitre.org/attackics/index.php/Software/S0003) relies on a user opening a trojanized installer attached to an email.(Citation: F-Secure Labs Jun 2014)(Citation: ICS Malware: Havex and Black Energy)
